About Me

Let me tell you the story...

BIO

A Full-stack Web Developer from a Geotechnical Engineering background, I have worked as a Geotechnical Engineer in many Mega Projects in Egypt. Then, I shifted my career to Web-Development about one year ago. I can provide Web-Development services using various technologies and stacks specially: .NET, MEAN, and MERN Stacks.

Freelancing

Full-Stack .NET Developer 2020-now

Web development using ASP.NET MVC C#, .NET framework, Entity Framework, SQL server, (REACT/Angular 6), AJAX, jQuery and third party web technologies.

Career Shifting Period

Learner 2019-2020

For about 8 monthes, I had a learning journy divided to phases:
1-Self-learning: (MongoDB,Node.js,Express.js,and REACT/Angular).
2- Russian Center in Cairo: (ASP.NET MVC, Entity Framework,and SQL Server).

ASU Geo-Unit and NECB

Geotechnical Engineer 2017-2019

Civil Engineering-Ain Shams University graduate. I had been Working for about two years as a Geotechnical Engineer in two reputable places:
